data.name: NarikiriVTuber
data.detailed_description:
Easy VTuber with VRM made with VRoid Studio.
Please use the hashtag #NarikiriVTuber.

VRM created with VRoid Studio can be displayed immediately without troublesome conversion.


  • Vroid compatible. VRM compatible
  • Face orientation estimation with webcam
  • Lip sync with voice from microphone
  • The model laughs when laughter comes in from the microphone
  • Eyebrow interlocking
  • Eyebrow transparency
  • Model mouth laughs when the width of the your mouth widens
  • Blue back / green back switching
  • Supports Leap Motion (Please place it facing up on the desktop)

ver.1.0.1 released

I made the entire eye area transparent to the hair.
Achieve more animated rendering.

Fixed other visual problems caused by IK.

data.short_description: Easy to be VTuber. Vroid&VRM compatible. Face orientation estimation with webcam Supports Leap Motion. etc.
